definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The, soft rot of sweetpotato is one of the main diseases in store.
sentences.chinese: 甘薯软腐病是甘薯储藏期间常发生的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: The, soft rot of sweetpotato is one of the main diseases in store.
sentences.chinese: 甘薯软腐病是甘薯储藏期间常发生的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: Purple sweet potato was used as the raw material to investigate the preparation processing of purple sweet potato beverage.
sentences.chinese: 以紫甘薯为原料探讨紫甘薯饮料制备的工艺条件。

sentences.english: Purple sweet potato was used as the raw material to investigate the preparation processing of purple sweet potato beverage.
sentences.chinese: 以紫甘薯为原料探讨紫甘薯饮料制备的工艺条件。

sentences.english: Prick potatoes all over with fork, wrap each in aluminum foil, and place on rimmed baking sheet.
sentences.chinese: 用叉子在甘薯上刺洞，用铝箔包裹，放置在烤单边缘。

sentences.english: Objective:To Polygonum multiflorum system similar to the counterfeit goods for real and fake identification comparison of sweet potato.
sentences.chinese: 目的对制何首乌的伪制相似品甘薯进真假鉴别比较。

sentences.english: For serving tea, there are fried slices of potatoes and sweet potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 作为茶点之用的，有炸薯片或甘薯。

sentences.english: The biology of Anophia leucomelas and its control measure were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道甘薯烦夜蛾的生物学和防治方法。

sentences.english: Establishment of embryogenic cell suspension cultures in sweet potato was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对甘薯胚性细胞悬浮培养系的建立进行了研究。

sentences.english: The breeding of new sweetpotato variety Fushu 2 and its major traits and characteristics was studied.
sentences.chinese: 报道了甘薯福薯2号选育及主要特征特性鉴定的过程。

sentences.english: As a new type energy crop, sweetpotato is more and more important.
sentences.chinese: 甘薯作为新型能源作物的作用已凸显出来。

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of transmitting tissue in the pistil of sweet, potato (Ipomeoa batatas) has been observed.
sentences.chinese: 对甘薯雌蕊引导组织细胞的超微结构进行了观察分析。

sentences.english: The sweet potato played a similar role in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，甘薯扮演了类似的角色。

sentences.english: The spray drying conditions of sweetpotato leaves extract(SPLE) were investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 探讨甘薯叶提取物的喷雾干燥制备工艺。

sentences.english: The industry of fuel ethanol production in sweet potato has still some critical.
sentences.chinese: 但目前针对燃料乙醇专用型甘薯的研究较少。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
